name: gambitph/otf-regenerate-thumbnails
description: Automatically regenerates your thumbnails on the fly when thumbnail sizes change.

post-archive-cmd: php -r "\$withVersion = true; \$finalZip = basename( getcwd() ) . '.zip'; foreach ( array_merge(glob('*.php'), glob('*.css')) as \$zipFile ) { \$f = file_get_contents( \$zipFile ); preg_match('/Plugin Name\\s*:\\s*([^\\n]+)/i', \$f, \$matches ); if (count(\$matches) < 2) { preg_match('/Theme Name\\s*:\\s*([^\\n]+)/i', \$f, \$matches ); if (count(\$matches) < 2) {continue;} } \$name = \$matches[1]; \$zipName = trim(strtolower(str_replace(' ', '-', \$name))); preg_match('/Version\\s*:\\s*([^\\n]+)/i', \$f, \$matches); if ( count(\$matches) < 2 ){ continue;} \$version = \$matches[1]; \$finalZip = \$zipName . '-' . \$version . '.zip'; if ( ! \$withVersion ) { \$finalZip = \$zipName . '.zip'; } } foreach ( glob('*.zip') as \$zipFile ) { rename( \$zipFile, \$finalZip ); break; }"

php -r "foreach ( glob('*.zip') as \$zipFile ) { \$dir = basename(\$zipFile, '.zip'); exec( 'mkdir _tmp && mv ' . \$zipFile . ' _tmp && cd _tmp && unzip ' . \$zipFile . ' -d ' . \$dir . ' && rm ' . \$zipFile . ' && zip -r9 ' . \$zipFile . ' ' . \$dir . ' && mv *.zip .. && cd .. && rm -R _tmp' ); exec( 'mv ' . \$zipFile . ' ..' ); } echo 'Created: ' . \$zipFile . \"\n\";"
